attributes.description: absolutely cute 62 Beetle. An original car that has been maintained and kept its unique character in the process. This example is mechanically superb, the engine having been rebuilt some 10,000 kms ago.  The car is fitted with Empi accessories wherever you look, adding to its charm. A very rare steering wheel completes the picture. The car reflects its 60 year old patina very gracefully. This is a jump in and set off to  the beach example. If you check the Autotrader ads there are numerous examples with several at the R350,000 and upwards level. The trick to a good Beetle is to drive as many as you can  for they differ dramatically in feel, depending on who and how they have been maintained. This is a good one. Check my pricing..............
attributes.title: 1962 Volkswagen Beetle

attributes.description:
FOR THE LOVE OF THE CAR!!!! - The ever so popular 2016 Mitsubishi ASX 2.0 5DR GL has arrived. So what has it got to offer - here goes. Strong, angular looks, good ground clearance and turning circle, as well as keyless entry, automatic wipers, touchscreen media system and leather-covered, power-operated seats. Electrically adjustable driver’s chair, rear park-distance control, HID headlamps with washers, air-conditioning and electrically folding mirrors.
When it comes to safety there is little that the ASX leaves out; standard systems include seven airbags (driver, passenger, seat, side curtains, driver knee), ABS with EBD and brake assist, side-impact protection beams, a collapsible steering column and whiplash reduction seats. Over and above this the standard features include Bluetooth, poweer steering and USB. Very economical and very competitive amongst the small SUV category. With a full Dekra condition and roadworthy report, you just need to come and collect this vehicle. Please note that the price does not include dealership fees and smash and grab.

attributes.description:
2021 BMW 330is Edition
With an acceleration of 0 – 100 kilometres per hour in 5.8 seconds and a power output of 190 kW, it is poised to set the pace. The new generation BMW TwinPower Turbo, 2 litre and 4-cylinder petrol engine is notable for its agile power delivery and outstanding responsiveness, even at low engine speeds. This results in high fuel efficiency and low emissions.
The BMW 330is Edition is equipped with an M Sport package and 20” M Performance wheels. The M Aerodynamic kit includes an M Performance front splitter, M Performance side skirts in body colour, M Performance boot spoiler and an M Performance exhaust for added sportiness.
The M Sport brakes have four-piston fixed callipers at the front and single-piston floating callipers at the rear, in blue with the M designation and features large brake discs to ensure outstanding stopping power.
The 10 millimetre lowered Adaptive M suspension can be electronically adjusted to suit all driving and road conditions. The driver can also adjust the suspension characteristics via the Driving Experience Control to enable their preferred driving style – from comfortable to athletic.
The variable sport steering creates a direct and agile steering response, improving the handling when driving more dynamically. This is complemented by the 8 -Speed Steptronic Sport transmission that offers sporty gear changes. Whether automatic or manual using gearshift paddles or the gear lever, the gear shifts are configured optimally.
The BMW Individual high-gloss Shadow Line (inspired by the BMW 325i Shadow Line introduced in 1985) with extended features also includes a black grille and darkened interior headlights. Each BMW 330is Edition also carries an authentic boot badge unique to the vehicle.
To spark nostalgia, the BMW 330is Edition is available in a choice of colours – from classic Glacier Silver, striking Melbourne Red and timeless Alpine White to the sleek Black Sapphire.
One-of-a -kind interior
From the unique Edition doorsills on the front passenger and driver side to the interior trim finisher with 330is, the BMW 330is Edition features an exclusively sporty interior. Unique door sills with 330is insignia for the front passenger and driver, as well as leather 'Vernasca' Black with decorative stitching ensure the vehicle stand out.
M seat belts, an M leather steering wheel, ambient interior lighting, anthracite roof lining, a glass sliding sunroof and a Harman Kardon Surround Sound system complete the package. The BMW 330is comes standard with next generation technology such as BMW Gesture Control, Park Assist and Live Cockpit Professional.
The sport seats for the driver and front passenger provide the most ideal lumbar support with their raised side bolsters and adjustable support. The fore-and-aft position and seat angle can be adjusted, as well as the backrest width.

attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 160 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us.
